mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_distinct_words(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = cleaned_string.lower().split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    distinct_words = word_counts.keys()
    sorted_words = sorted(distinct_words, key=lambda w: word_counts[w], reverse=True)
    return (len(distinct_words), sorted_words)

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_distinct_words(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = cleaned_string.lower().split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    distinct_words = word_counts.keys()
    sorted_words = sorted(distinct_words, key=lambda w: word_counts[w], reverse=True)
    return (len(distinct_words), sorted_words)

mutants.mutated_line: sorted_words = sorted(distinct_words, key=lambda w: word_counts[w], reverse=False)
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_distinct_words(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    words = cleaned_string.lower().split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    distinct_words = word_counts.keys()
    sorted_words = sorted(distinct_words, key=lambda w: word_counts[w], reverse=False)
    return (len(distinct_words), sorted_words)
